title: Commitment to Privacy
cleaned_text: Commitment to Privacy We collect limited information about web visitors and use cookies on our website to provide you with the most optimal experience. These cookies help us provide you with personalized content and improve our website. To learn more about our web site privacy practices, please review [VCU's privacy statement](https://www.vcu.edu/privacy-statement/). By clicking on "I agree", you agree to this use.
